title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\CreateDlpJobRequest
name: CreateDlpJobRequest
description:
Request message for CreateDlpJobRequest. Used to initiate long running jobs such as calculating risk metrics or inspecting Google Cloud Storage.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.CreateDlpJobRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description:
Required. Parent resource name. The format of this value varies depending on whether you have specified a processing location: + Projects scope, location specified:
projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOCATION_ID + Projects scope, no location specified (defaults to global):
projects/PROJECT_ID The following example parent string specifies a parent project with the identifier example-project, and specifies the europe-west3 location for processing data: parent=projects/example-project/locations/europe-west3

params.name: data.inspect_job
params.description: An inspection job scans a storage repository for InfoTypes.

params.name: data.risk_job
params.description: A risk analysis job calculates re-identification risk metrics for a BigQuery table.

params.name: data.job_id
params.description: The job id can contain uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens; that is, it must match the regular expression: [a-zA-Z\d-_]+. The maximum length is 100 characters. Can be empty to allow the system to generate one.
